sentences.english: The negative serological negative conversion rate of syphilis treatment was low.
sentences.chinese: 潜伏梅毒治疗血清阴转率偏低。

sentences.english: Syphilis was the most feared of venereal diseases.
sentences.chinese: 梅毒是最让人谈虎色变的一种性传播疾病。

sentences.english: Results 16 syphilitic had one or more than one treponemal antibodies in CSF.
sentences.chinese: 结果有16例梅毒患者脑脊液存在梅毒抗体。

sentences.english: Results 16 syphilitic had one or more than one treponemal antibodies in CSF.
sentences.chinese: 结果有16例梅毒患者脑脊液存在梅毒抗体。

sentences.english: Repeated examinations of Treponema pallidum by dark field microscope and serologic tests for syphilis were negative.
sentences.chinese: 反复暗视野查梅毒螺旋体及梅毒血清试验均阴性。

sentences.english: Repeated examinations of Treponema pallidum by dark field microscope and serologic tests for syphilis were negative.
sentences.chinese: 反复暗视野查梅毒螺旋体及梅毒血清试验均阴性。

sentences.english: Trichomoniasis is more common than syphilis.
Objective To analyse the clinical features of neurosyphilis in order to help early diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析神经梅毒的临床特征及提供早期诊断依据。

sentences.english: I went to a private clinic for administration, was diagnosed as suffering from syphilis.
sentences.chinese: 我便到一家私营诊所求治，结果被诊断为患有梅毒。

sentences.english: Paper Province Jiangmen prevention work in rural areas in rapid screening for syphilis.
sentences.chinese: 省皮防工作人员在江门农村地区进行梅毒快速筛查。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the significance of several methods in diagnosis of neurosyphilis for understanding the incidence of asymptomatic neurosyphilis.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较几种诊断方法对无症状神经梅毒的诊断意义。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical characteristics of craniocerebral surgery in the patients with neurosyphilis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨合并神经梅毒病灶的颅脑手术临床特点。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the imaging manifestations of cerebral gumma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨树胶肿型神经梅毒的影像学表现。

sentences.english: The positive rate of Treponema pallidum antibody in patients with malignant tumor is high.
sentences.chinese: 恶性肿瘤患者梅毒感染的阳性率较高。

sentences.english: Syphilis developed a few days after the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 婚后没几天就染上了梅毒。

sentences.english: People who have been cured of syphilis are immune to new syphilitic infections.
sentences.chinese: 梅毒被治愈的人对新的梅毒感染有免疫能力。

definition: variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
